runs.comm: gone first ball, short and down the leg side, Ryder looks to turn it fine, gets a glove to it and straight to the keeper, the dead ball has played its role, whatever went through Ryder's head when it was bowled
good length on the off, rocks forward and opens the face to steer it to point
short of a good length on the off, punched off the back foot to mid-off
slightly back of a length on middle, gets back and knocks it towards mid-on this time
goes after it and was almost bowled, short and he looked to pull it over square leg, got an inside edge onto the thighs and just over the stumps

poor footwork from Razzaq, though it would not have made much difference even if he was Pele for that one moment, short, Franklin tries to jab it through the leg side again, mistimes it, lands on the pitch and Guptill calls for the single, Razzaq tries to kick the ball onto the stumps, doesn't quite get his radar right
quick but misdirected, down the leg side and it's a wide
short of a good length on middle, gets back and knocks it into the leg side
appeal for lbw, nipped in from a good length on the off, whizzed through the gap between bat and pad, flicked the pads on the way to the keeper, was too high, though it didn't miss the stumps by much
firing it at 146 kmph, good carry through to the keeper, good length and shot off the pitch, left alone and Umar Akmal did well behind the stumps
short of a good length outside off, guided from the crease to third man
goodish length on middle and off, taps it into the off side and sets off for a single
back of a length on the off, rocks back and defends it solidly towards cover
stabbed off the back foot towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single
good length and it's driven well on the up though straight to extra cover
massive, massive, length ball and it gets the treatment, "Sound of Thunder" screams Ramiz Raja on the TV commentary, dispatched it way over midwicket for a humungous six
goodish length on middle, gets forward and drops it into the leg side
short and it gets the treatment again, on middle and off and it's pulled away over the vacant square-leg region for four
straying on the pads and pays the price, Guptill looks to glance it down fine but it clips the pads to beat the short fine leg fielder to the ropes
quick, 143 kmph, short of a good length on the off, rocks back and angles it towards point

slower one and Franklin picks it but doesn't make contact, it's fullish outside off and he wants to send it over mid-on but can't reach it, freehit though, he has a chance to make up because Shoaib overstapped
149 kmph this time, makes a bit of room and the bowler chases him, short ball, fends it wide of square leg, that's all he can manage, just the single
another six, and it lands straight on the umbrella covering the cameraman behind the straight boundary, short ball outside off and he slaps it over the bowler's head, clean strike
overthrows, back of a length outside off, dropped behind point and he sets off for a single, Ahmed Shehzad needlessly throws at the striker's end, no one backing up and it's more runs
fires it at 147 kph on middle, stays in the crease and pushes it to extra cover
short of a good length on the off, punches it past cover for a single to keep strike
short of a good length outside off at 141 kmph, chopped down towards point
short and wide, tries to slash it over point, can't make contact, there for the taking but that's an opportunity missed
back of a length on the off, punches it down towards long-off for a single
beautifully picked, straying on the pads again and it's clipped over square leg, timed well enough to take it almost to the ropes, landed just inside
superb shot, there is a long-on in place however, full on middle and it's driven soundly down the ground
slower one bowled short outside off, comes down the track and tries to swat it over the infield on the off side, mistimes it wide of mid-on for a single
starts with a wide down the leg side, not surprising
another one, short one down the leg side, a little less surprising this time
short and wide this time, tries to cut it square, bowled at 143 kmph, misses
well fielded at point, by Shehzad, short and wide and it's cut well but Shehzad flings himself to his left to stop that
slower one, just a fraction outside leg stump, Franklin tried to swing it over square leg but missed it, didn't pick the variation in pace there
well fielded again by Shehzad, throws himself to his right this time, short and wide and cut away but he's there at point again, keeps them down to a single
another wide, short one down the leg side and gifts away another run

slower one bowled short on middle, chips it over short fine leg, was a little fortunate there, didn't pick the slower one but he checked his shot and that ensured it didn't carry to the fielder running in from the deep
too many slower ones and this one does get punished, no trouble for Franklin to pick this up, short on middle and it's hammered over midwicket
flighted, pitched up outside off and it's driven to extra cover
fullish again, pushed back firmly to the bowler
slips that one quicker on middle and leg, flicked past square leg for a quick single
tossed up, pitched up outside off, driven down towards long-on for a single
ooh, quicker ball on middle, fullish and he tries to swing it over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his pads
good over, short ball outside off, chopped down towards point
goodish length outside off, mistimes a drive to extra cover
full toss this time, stabs it to cover and races off for a single
short of a good length on middle, gets across and tucks it towards fine leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, cut away hard past point, he'd struggled to find the gap there on two previous occasions in the previous over but has managed to succeed this time
banged in short on middle and he ducks under it easily
pitched up and it's cracked through to deep cover for a single
pitched up outside off, lands on a length and it's driven to long-off
swept past square leg for a single this time
appeal for lbw, quicker ball, Guptill took a couple of steps down the track, pad first and then bat but his advance down the track saved him there
punched past midwicket into the deep, into that gap between deep midwicket and long-on, two more
gets on the back foot and knocks it past midwicket for a single
good ball, drifted in and then spun away to take the outside edge as Guptill poked at it, beat short third man to the boundary, unfortunate result for Afridi there
floating it outside off from round the wicket, cracked past extra cover for a brace
around a good length on the off, taps it in front of point for  a single
good length on middle, turns the face and works it past midwicket, senses a chance to come back for the second with the field spread out and do so without any difficulty
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot to midwicket
looping it towards middle, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
attacks this time, flattish delivery but he had made his mind up, came down the track, took it from a length and lofted it over midwicket for another six
short of a good length outside off, guided to short third man
pushed down the ground towards long-off for a single
short of a good length on middle, gets back and works it past square leg for a single
pushed to extra cover, Guptill wants a single but Franklin wisely sends him back
pitched up and it's drilled down the ground, Afridi tried to stop it but it ricocheted off his hands to beat the diving Shehzad at the long-on boundary, that's how hard it was struck
edged towards short third man, an excellent throw from Shoaib at the striker's end, a direct hit but Guptill's made it in time
goes for the sweep, plays it down to short fine for a quick single

Guptill's gone, a very well-judged catch from Afridi, round the wicket and tweaked it hard though it was the doosra, Guptill had targeted midwicket and tried to clear the boundary, got a top edge and Afridi, standing at midwicket, judged it to perfection with another fielder converging from behind
fires it short on middle, knocked past midwicket for a single
doosra again, closed the face on that one expecting it to turn in, missed, beaten rather
went on straight this time, knocked in front of square leg for a single
good length on the off, a hint of away turn, pushed in front of cover for a single

the googly and it's proved effective, two set batsmen depart in quick succession, Franklin tried to cut that behind point, got a thin edge and Umar Akmal, who's done well behind the stumps, makes no mistake
drifting in towards middle and off, defended towards point
good length on the off, pushed off the front foot to extra cover
goes on straight, comes down the track and chips it past midwicket for a single
shortish outside off, cuts it hard down to point
pitched up on the off, pushed down past midwicket for a single
short and wide, struck hard but straight to deep cover for a single
good length on the off, pushed firmly past extra cover, who gets a hand to it, for a single
shortish on the off, slower one, drops it in front of cover for a single
opens the face slightly against that slower ball and plays it behind point for a single, 100 up
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it to extra cover, good over thus far
slower one on the off, knocks it down in front of cover for another single
superb yorker from Gul, on middle and he does well to dig it out, past midwicket, an attempt at a direct hit at the non-striker's end, was out if that had hit
streaky Styris, short on middle, made room to pull it over midwicket, got an inside edge past short fine leg for a welcome boundary
full on the off, drilled down to mid-off who's inside the circle
smotes it into the crowd behind the midwicket boundary, shortish, Styris stood his ground and heaved it where he wanted it to go
sweetly struck, New Zealand are getting back on track after losing those two wickets, pitched up and it's smashed over the bowler's head for four more
yorker length and he manages to squeeze it out wide of cover for a quick single to keep strike
Six more, Styris is cashing in on these short ones, on middle and he pulls it disdainfully off the front foot over midwicket, cow corner kept busy
the runs keep flowing, full and wide and he makes room to slice it over point, carries all the way over the ropes, Shoaib is helpless
aiming for the yorker, saw him make room, chased him and Styris flicked it fine, to the fine-leg boundary, what an over for New Zealand
slower one bowled short and he holes out this time, tries to heave it over midwicket again but doesn't pick the slower one and doesn't get hold of it, Ahmed Shehzad makes no mistake
slower one bowled full on middle, worked away towards midwicket for a quick single, Shehzad concedes an overthrow as he misses the stumps
back of a length on middle, gets back and knocks it down wide of midwicket for a single
loops it full on middle and leg, tries to clip that over midwicket, can't connect, is struck on the pads
repeats the shot and connects and connects well, picks it up from middle and leg and sends it over wide long-on
what a shot, short ball outside off, fetches it from there and swats it over midwicket, wide of long-on for a boundary
short and pulled away again but straight to deep midwicket this time, just the single
short ball on middle, the doosra, rocks back and knocks it into the off side
quicker ball and bowled flat on middle, pushed down the ground for a single
the scoop, haven't seen that in a while, fetches it from a good length outside off and gets it over short fine for a boundary
clever stuff, banged in short, swivels slightly and helps it over short fine leg for a one bounce four
four more, pitched up outside off and he finds the gap, the one between extra cover and mid-off, Gul's being taken for runs and it's no power hitting, just shrewd batsmanship
McGlashan's enjoying this, that's a reverse-swept six! Full on the off, he gets into position early and picks him between point and third man, all the way to the ropes, punishment!
Another one, McGlashan, take a bow! Short ball this time and he repeats the shot, except that this time it's more of a reverse-swat, same region, over the ropes, six more, Gul can only smile
good comeback, but too little, too late, banged it short as McGlashan gave himself room, managed to evade it but sneaks a bye to keep strike the next over
pitched up outside off, squeezes it past cover into the deep for a single
full outside off, reached for it, was a touch too wide, sliced it to third man for a single
gone, plumb! Full on middle and he walked way across to swipe it through square leg, missed and was caught in front
pitched it up outside off, a little too wide, got an outside edge as he chased it, went to the keeper on the bounce
low full toss outside off, cracked it through extra cover for a single
full on the off, played it in front of point for a quick single
is dispatched first up, drops it short on middle and gets the treatment, pulled away over deep midwicket for a powerful six
went for the reverse sweep, bowled from round the wicket, didn't get hold of it and it found the fielder converging from deep point, Asad Shafiq, who judged it well diving forward
fires it short outside off, makes room to cart it over the bowler's head, misses
long hop and he'll be disappointed he missed out there, pulls it straight to deep square leg
Umar Akmal continues to keep well, misses the straighter one does Mills as he tries to go downtown, Akmal takes the bails off and Mills is short
